title: Deputies: Man injured while shooting shotgun in Town of Bergen
content:
Genesee County Sheriff’s deputies say that a man was injured while he was shooting a shotgun Sunday morning in the Town of Bergen.
Deputies say the emergency dispatch center got the call for the incident at 9:17 a.m. They say the 61-year-old was on Buffalo Road when a shot injured his finger. They say Bergen Volunteer Fire Department ambulance took him to Strong Hospital to be treated.
